meaningMnemonic: You use the <radical>power</radical> of your <radical>mouth</radical> to spit <radical>shellfish</radical> at people as a form of <kanji>congratulations</kanji>! In fact, you yell "CONGRATULATIONS!" as the shellfish come pouring out of your powerful mouth.
readingMnemonic: When you say <kanji>congratulations</kanji> like this, you look just like a <reading>ga</reading>rgoyle (が). You're crouching down, your mouth wide open, just like a stone gargoyle.
